[陈]
Simplified from 陳 ( 東 → 东 )

[陳]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *l'iŋ, *l'iŋs ): semantic 阜 ( “ mound ” ) + phonetic 東 ( OC *toːŋ ) – to display; to arrange.

[陣]
Derivation from 敶 , itself derived from an ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 東 ( “ sack? ” ) + 東 + 攴 ; later, one 東 was abbreviated, and a 阜 added on the left.

[阵]
Simplified from 陣 ( 車 → 车 ).
